## ABufferOIT.setRenderStates() method

Sets the render states for the renderer.

This function will be called when the transparent object will be rendered.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setRenderStates(rs: RenderStateSet): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rs | [RenderStateSet](doc/markdown/./device.renderstateset.md) | The render states. |

**Returns:**

void
